flawed_nl_solution:
His dining room is 4 walls and he has already removed 1 wall of wallpaper so that leaves 4-1 = <<4-1=3>>3 walls in the dining room
He has 3 walls left in the dining room and 4 in his living room for a total of 3+4 = <<3+4=11>>11 walls
It takes 2 hours to remove wallpaper from just 1 wall and he has 11 more to go so it will take him 2*11 = <<2*11=22>>22 hours
#### 22

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
